content:
I've added those to your list:

1. Avengers: Endgame (2019)
2. Joker (2019)
3. Stranger Things (Season 3) (2019)
4. Toy Story 4 (2019)

I'll note that Stranger Things is a TV series, not a movie, but I've included it in your list since you mentioned it. Let me know if you'd like to separate your movie and TV show lists in the future.

Keep going! What else have you watched recently?
